casebody.data:
The People of the State of New York, Respondent, v Bernard Bergman, Appellant. Ramsey Clark, Receiver. Submitted February 22, 1977; decided April 7, 1977

Reported below, 55 AD2d 542.

Motion to dismiss the appeal herein granted and the appeal dismissed, with costs and $20 costs of motion, upon the ground that the dissent at the Appellate Division is not on a question of law (CPLR 5601, subd [a], par [i]).
